com.jbion.utils.progress

Class PercentProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.progress.AbstractProgressBar
      • com.jbion.utils.progress.ReDrawnProgressBar
        • com.jbion.utils.progress.PercentProgressBar

  • public class PercentProgressBar
extends ReDrawnProgressBar
    A extended version of ReDrawnProgressBar that includes a percentage display.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Constructor Detail

      • PercentProgressBar

        public PercentProgressBar(int total,
                  int length,
                  ReDrawnProgressBar.ReDrawMode mode)
        Creates a new PercentProgressBar.
        Parameters:
        total - The number of elements this ProgressBar represents.
        length - The number of characters used to display this AbstractProgressBar when it is complete.
        mode - The way to redraw this progress bar.
